long_desc: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
flags_raw: She is the last bastion of good in this realm.  Her mission is to
stats1_raw: someday free the slaves of the Empress.  She has been trapped here for
stats2_raw: time eternal, and now the evil power of Arachnos feeds upon her intense
stats3_raw: magical energies.  She will never give up here fight against evil,
